about_the_game:
This Cyberpunk-styled game is inspired by the gameplay of Game Dev Tycoon and the aesthetic of VA-11 HALL-A, sci-fi, and lofi city beats!



  • Explore a Sci-Fi city in a dystopian, cyberpunk future
  • Manage your expenses, make drinks, and use social media to further your popularity and profits.
  • Expand your reach to other industries by building or purchasing new businesses and companies.
  • Meet and befriend your regulars as your popularity grows to learn about the personal lives of androids, noir detectives, augmented humans, and more in visual novel-style dialogues.
  • Enjoy a selection of chill, jazzhop, and lofi beats!
detailed_description:
Recommended for You





About the Game

This Cyberpunk-styled game is inspired by the gameplay of Game Dev Tycoon and the aesthetic of VA-11 HALL-A, sci-fi, and lofi city beats!



  • Explore a Sci-Fi city in a dystopian, cyberpunk future
  • Manage your expenses, make drinks, and use social media to further your popularity and profits.
  • Expand your reach to other industries by building or purchasing new businesses and companies.
  • Meet and befriend your regulars as your popularity grows to learn about the personal lives of androids, noir detectives, augmented humans, and more in visual novel-style dialogues.
  • Enjoy a selection of chill, jazzhop, and lofi beats!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sierra or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory

name: Cyberpunk Bar Sim

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory

short_description: Own and manage a futuristic bar, meet quirky customers, market, and expand!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
